name: LS Dark Mode
description: Why doesn't a web development school's curriculum have a dark mode? Made by a student at LS, this is not officially sponsored or endorsed in any way, I just made this for my eyes.
additional_info:
v1.2.1
Minor fixes

v1.2.0
Took Nick's changes and added fa min-width to .wrapper, works much better than anything I ever came up with. All credits to Nick.

v1.1.0
Started the process of centering some items. Still working on centering the paragraphs and content.
